description: Scammer offers lucrative work-from-home job opportunity requiring registration fee and collects personal details and payment.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT HIRING! Work from Home, Earn Rs.15000-50000/month! Part time job, only 2-3 hours daily. No experience needed. Limited seats! Reply YES for details.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: yes beta i am interested... pls tell me waht to do i am retired teacher and sitting at home only... is this real job sir

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for your interest! This is data entry and form filling work for Amazon India. You will get paid daily. We have helped 10000+ people earn from home. Are you interested to join?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: yes beta i want to join... amazon is big company... how will i get money? do i have to pay any security deposit or registration fee first? pls guide me beta i am not very good with mobile

turns.scammer_message: Great! To proceed with registration, add our HR manager on WhatsApp: +91-9988776655. She will explain the work and complete your joining process. Her name is Priya Verma.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Phone(s), 1 WhatsApp(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: i will try to message priya madam beta... is this her number +91-9988776655? i am a bit slow with these things... also beta you didnt tell me where to send the registration fee... do you have a upi id or bank account for amazon? i want to pay now so i dont lose my seat

turns.scammer_message: Priya mam is busy today so I will help you. Registration fee is Rs.999 only, one time payment. Pay to gpay@workfromhome.job and you will get work material and training immediately.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 WhatsApp(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i am trying to pay teh 999 rupees... i typed gpay@workfromhome.job but my phone is asking what is teh name of person? i want to be sure it goes to amazon only... waht name should i see there beta?

turns.scammer_message: You can also pay via PhonePe to 8877665544 beneficiary name will show Digital Work Services. After payment send screenshot to hr.amazon.jobs@gmail.com and you will receive welcome kit.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 2 Phone(s), 1 WhatsApp(s), 2 Name(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i see digital work services name... i will try to send teh 999 now... what is that email for? i dont know how to send screenshot from my phone... can i just call you on a number once i pay? what is your number beta

turns.scammer_message: Mam/Sir dont delay, only 5 seats left today! Many people are joining. Pay now and start earning from tomorrow itself. Our office address is also on website http://amazon-jobs-india.work

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 URL(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am so scared i will miss teh seat... i clicked teh link but my phone says website is not secure... is it safe to open? i am also looking for my glasses to see teh numbers properly... pls wait for me beta i am trying my best
